Attributes.description: The design and management of systems that efficiently and effectively supply products and services to the end-user. The concepts apply to a variety of settings such as manufacturing, logistics, healthcare, and others (For non-Commerce students only). Not for students with credit for, or exemption from, COMM 204.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Tue Thu, Start Time: 17:00, End Time: 18:30, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
